remarks: Elementhood in the relation ` F ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2016.)
statement:
qlift.1 $e |- F = ran ( x e. X |-> <. [ x ] R , A >. ) $.
qlift.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. Y ) $.
qlift.3 $e |- ( ph -> R Er X ) $.
qlift.4 $e |- ( ph -> X e. _V ) $.
qliftel $p |- ( ph -> ( [ C ] R F D <-> E. x e. X ( C R x /\ D = A ) ) ) $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d R x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
